content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery
GO

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    AS [result]

--Getting the datatype information for all the columns
EXEC SP_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''calendar_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) 
    AS [result]'

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    AS [result]

--Define the data types
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME,
        lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME,
        store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
            fare_amount FLOAT,
            trip_type INT
         )
    AS [result]
